pages.title: Advanced Reborn
pages.text: Advanced Reborn is an extension of $(l:patchouli:blocks/tech_reborn)Tech Reborn$() that adds more machines, tools, armor, and automation options.$(br2)(No in-game book available)

pages.title: Cardboard Boxes
pages.text: Early game shulker boxes! Set them down, fill them up, and carry them around.

pages.title: Charging Pads
pages.text: Charge your gear just by standing on the pad. There are 5 varieties, each improving and building on the previous. You need to put a capacitor such as the $(item)Battery Box$() under this.

pages.title: Auto Crafting Table
pages.text: These machines runs almost permanently without the sun. Tier 1 is required to build the $(item)Permanent Light Generators$()

pages.title: Induction Furnace
pages.text: This furnace upgrade can speed up smelting by adding two output slots and two insertion slots to the electric furnace and gives a redstone signal.

pages.title: Rotary Grinder
pages.text: This grinder upgrade can speed up grinding by adding two output slots and two insertion slots and gives a redstone signal.

pages.title: Centrifugal Extractor
pages.text: This extractor upgrade can speed up grinding by adding two output slots and two insertion slots and gives a redstone signal.

pages.title: Singularity Compressor
pages.text: This compressor upgrade can speed up smelting by adding two output slots and two insertion slots and gives a redstone signal.

pages.title: Canning Machine
pages.text: This machine makes fuel cans and canned food.

pages.title: Teleporter
pages.text: You can set the coordinates on the frequency transmitter and teleport. Requires: $(item)Frequency Transmitter$().$(br2)Right-clicks on the Teleporter with the transmitter to save the location of that Teleporter. Then left-click on another Teleporter to link them. Place a power storage device next to each Teleporter. Teleport an entity by sending a redstone signal.

pages.title: Farming Machine
pages.text: Automatically harvest and plant your crops, I think.

pages.title: Logging Machine
pages.text: Automatically chops trees and plants your sapplings, I think.

pages.title: Industrial TNT
pages.text: This TNT variant won't hurt entities. You can now safely blow up the village without hurting your villagers.

pages.title: Dynamite
pages.text: Four variants of throwable dynamite.$(br2)$(li)$(item)Dynamite$():Bounces around and explodes when thrown$(li)$(item)Sticky Dynamite$(): Sticks to the first thing it hits and explodes$(li)$(item)Industrial Dynamite$(): Bounces around and explodes blocks only$(li)$(item)Industrial Sticky Dynamite$(): Sticks to things and explodes blocks only
